patthana23.43:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.43:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana23.43:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
